page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content:
{LIVING ON KING ARTHURS WAY On the estate there is some trouble and{vandelism.}Most of the houses on King Arthurs Way have had to be {rebuilt}because of construction problems. There should be more shops on the estate as Andover town centre is about 2 miles away. The estate should not get too much like a town. This is the opinion of an{old}lady.
The estate is convenient for mothers with small children with enough shops for every day needs. There is too much {vandelism}in the area. The bus service to{Andover}town centre is good but rather expensive. This is the opinion of a{young}mother.
